# grafana_oncall_user_group (Data Source)

* [HTTP API](https://grafana.com/docs/oncall/latest/oncall-api-reference/user_groups/)

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "grafana_oncall_user_group" "example_user_group" {
  slack_handle = "example_slack_handle"
}
```
